title: Matlab will be used in only sem1 or other sems also ? I am in cse

comments.body: Bold of u to assume that matlab is over

I was told by my senior that matlab is useful as it is pretty useful in computer aided design(CAD), hence it's important to learn Matlab

You will see matlab in ur senior years, make sure u knw the stuff later

So far, we have been instructed to just copy some matlab instructions into our record books and not pay attention to it much. Hence my question. I now understand it will be needed in future. Thank you for the heads-up.
